name: @continuum/jtag
description: Production-grade universal debugging system. One import = console routing + WebSocket logging + screenshot capture. Zero config, works everywhere.
author: Continuum Development Team

scripts.start:direct: npm run smart-build && npm run system:deploy && npm run system:run
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf dist/ 2>/dev/null || true; rm -rf examples/dist/ 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f *.tgz 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:ts
scripts.postbuild: npm run paths:clean && npx tsx scripts/create-import-map.ts && npx tsx scripts/convert-imports-to-relative.ts
scripts.prepack: npm run paths:clean && npx tsx scripts/create-import-map.ts
scripts.system:stop: npx tsx scripts/cleanup-dynamic-ports.ts --force && npm run signal:clear
scripts.system:restart: npm run system:stop && npm run restart
scripts.system:ensure: npm run signal:check || (npm run system:start && npm run signal:wait)
scripts.signal:logs: echo 'ðŸ“‹ System startup logs:' && cat .continuum/jtag/system/logs/npm-start.log 2>/dev/null | tail -50 || echo 'No startup logs found'
scripts.signal:errors: echo 'âŒ Recent errors from signal system:' && cat .continuum/jtag/signals/system-ready.json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.errors[]?, .nodeErrors[]?' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No signal file found'
scripts.test:tty: tmux kill-session -t debug-npm 2>/dev/null; rm -f /tmp/debug-npm.log; tmux new-session -d -s debug-npm "script -q /dev/null npm run clean" \; pipe-pane -o 'cat >> /tmp/debug-npm.log'
scripts.system:debug: echo '=== Tmux session state ===' && (tmux has-session -t jtag-test 2>/dev/null && echo 'Session running' && tmux capture-pane -t jtag-test -p || echo 'Session not running') && echo '' && echo '=== Log file ===' && tail -20 .continuum/jtag/system/logs/npm-start.log
scripts.test: timeout 300 bash -c 'rm -rf examples/test-bench/.continuum/jtag/currentUser/logs/* 2>/dev/null || true && npm run test:start-and-test' || (echo 'âŒ ERROR: npm test exceeded 300-second timeout - system may be hung' && echo 'ðŸ” Check system logs: .continuum/jtag/system/logs/npm-start.log' && echo 'ðŸ› ï¸  Try: npm run system:stop && npm run system:start' && exit 1)
scripts.test:verify-and-run: echo 'ðŸ” WAITING FOR SYSTEM BOOTSTRAP...' && npm run signal:wait && echo 'ðŸ” VERIFYING SYSTEM BOOTSTRAP...' && grep 'Bootstrap complete' examples/test-bench/.continuum/jtag/currentUser/logs/browser-console-log.log | tail -1 && echo 'âœ… BOOTSTRAP VERIFIED - RUNNING TESTS' && npm run test:comprehensive
scripts.test:comprehensive: echo 'ðŸš€ AUTONOMOUS TEST SUITE - Full End-to-End' && npx tsx tests/bootstrap-comprehensive.test.ts && npx tsx tests/integration/browser-automated-tests.test.ts && npx tsx tests/server-screenshot.test.ts && npx tsx tests/screenshot-verification.test.ts && npx tsx tests/signal-system.test.ts && npx tsx tests/chat-daemon-integration.test.ts && npx tsx tests/chat-real-data.test.ts
scripts.test:simple: echo 'ðŸš€ SIMPLE TEST SUITE' && npx tsx tests/bootstrap-comprehensive.test.ts
scripts.test:unit: echo 'ðŸ§ª Unit Tests (needs import path fixes)' && echo 'TODO: Fix unit test imports'
scripts.test:integration: echo 'ðŸ”— Integration Tests: Transport & Cross-Context Commands' && npm run test:transport && npm run test:cross-context && npm run test:routing
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'ðŸŽ¯ End-to-End Tests (needs system running first: npm run system:start)' && npm run test:server-client
scripts.test:quick: echo 'âš¡ Quick Tests: Transport & Cross-Context (no system needed)' && npm run test:transport && npm run test:cross-context
scripts.test:manual: echo 'ðŸ“‹ Manual Test Suite (assumes system running)' && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all: npm run test:layer-1 && npm run test:layer-2 && npm run test:layer-3 && npm run test:layer-4 && npm run test:promise-event-system && npm run test:layer-5 && npm run test:layer-6 && npm run test:transport-flexibility && npm run test:verify
scripts.test:layer-1: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 1: Foundation + Browser Bootstrap' && npm run test:foundation && npm run test:browser-bootstrap
scripts.test:layer-2: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 2: Daemon Processes + Browser Connection' && npm run test:daemons && npm run test:browser-connection
scripts.test:layer-3: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 3: Message Transport + Browser WebSocket' && npm run test:transport && npm run test:browser-transport
scripts.test:layer-4: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 4: System Integration + Browser Commands' && npm run test:integration && npm run test:browser-commands
scripts.test:promise-event-system: echo 'ðŸ§… Promise/Event System: Type-Safe Messages + Promise Chain Tests' && npx tsx tests/promise-event-system-test-suite.ts
scripts.test:layer-5: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 5: Console Interception + Browser Logging' && npm run test:console && npm run test:browser-logging
scripts.test:layer-6: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 6: End-to-End + Browser Automation' && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:browser-automation
scripts.pretest:integration: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting integration tests (requires: npm run system:start)'
scripts.test:foundation: npx tsx tests/layer-1-foundation/types-compilation.test.ts && npx tsx tests/layer-1-foundation/encoding-abstraction.test.ts && npx tsx tests/unit/JTAGMessageTypes.test.ts && npx tsx tests/unit/ResponseCorrelator.test.ts && npx tsx tests/unit/JTAGMessageQueue.test.ts
scripts.test:unit-core: echo 'âš ï¸ Unit tests need import path updates - skipping for now'
scripts.test:help: echo 'JTAG Test Suite - Intelligent Signal-Based Testing:' && echo '  npm test           - Autonomous test suite (RECOMMENDED)' && echo '  npm run test:auto  - Same as above - intelligent startup detection' && echo '  npm run test:unit  - Unit tests (TODO: fix imports)' && echo '  npm run test:quick - Fast tests (no system startup needed)' && echo '  npm run test:manual- Manual tests (assumes system already running)' && echo '' && echo 'System Management:' && echo '  npm run system:start      - Start with intelligent monitoring' && echo '  npm run signal:check      - Check if system is ready' && echo '  npm run signal:logs       - View startup logs' && echo '  npm run signal:errors     - View startup errors' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸŽ¯ BREAKTHROUGH: No more 45-second waits! System signals when ready.' && echo 'ðŸ“ˆ Tests start immediately when system is actually ready.' && echo 'ðŸ” Error detection guides you to the right logs automatically.'
scripts.test:verify: echo 'ðŸŽ¯ All JTAG middle-out tests passed!' && npm run logs:show
scripts.test:server-client: echo 'ðŸ”— Testing server-client integration (requires running system)' && npx tsx tests/integration/server-client-integration.test.ts
scripts.test:browser-integration: echo 'ðŸŒ Testing REAL browser integration (runs IN JTAG browser)' && npx tsx tests/integration/browser-automated-tests.test.ts
scripts.test:p2p: echo 'ðŸ•¸ï¸ Testing P2P mesh networking (spawns multiple instances)' && npx tsx tests/integration/p2p-mesh-networking.test.ts
scripts.test:p2p-discovery: echo 'ðŸ” Testing P2P node discovery only' && JTAG_P2P_TEST_TYPE=discovery npx tsx tests/integration/p2p-mesh-networking.test.ts
scripts.test:p2p-routing: echo 'ðŸ“¡ Testing P2P message routing only' && JTAG_P2P_TEST_TYPE=routing npx tsx tests/integration/p2p-mesh-networking.test.ts
scripts.test:chat-integration: echo 'ðŸ’¬ Testing chat daemon integration (runs IN JTAG browser)' && npm run system:ensure && npx tsx tests/chat-daemon-integration.test.ts
scripts.test:chat-load: echo 'ðŸ“Š Testing chat real data load scenarios (runs IN JTAG browser)' && npm run system:ensure && npx tsx tests/chat-real-data.test.ts
scripts.test:chat-tdd: echo 'ðŸ§ª TDD Chat daemon tests (Red â†’ Green â†’ Refactor)' && npm run system:ensure && npx tsx tests/chat-daemon-tdd.test.ts
